author: ChatGPT
content: 물론이야! 아래 문장을 제안해: --- Collaboration Call We are open to joint research, co-development, or licensing opportunities related to this quantum optimization framework. We believe this work can significantly enhance IBM s quantum computing roadmap, especially in areas of coherence optimization, ethical AI, and simulation efficiency. We welcome exploratory conversations to align mutual goals and bring this innovation to life. --- 필요하면 좀 더 짧거나 포멀하게도 수정해줄게!
